scenario.name: UAC send 491 on UPDATE
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "UAC send 491 on UPDATE (resync media test)" <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, UPDATE Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Require: 100rel Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

PRACK [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] PRACK RAck: [$last_rseq] [$last_cseq] INVITE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

UPDATE [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "UAC send 491 on UPDATE " <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>[peer_tag_param] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] UPDATE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654322 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

BYE [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "UAC send 491 on UPDATE" <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>[peer_tag_param] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "UAC send 491 on UPDATE (resync media test)" <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Require: 100rel Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, UPDATE [authentication] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

warning.message: First session version ([$first_ss_vrs]) must be greater than second ([$second_ss_vrs])
First session id ([$first_ss_id]) must be equal second session id ([$second_ss_id])
